events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but I want to request a refund because the size doesn't fit me at all and I don't want to keep it.
The issue has been categorized as a Refund request due to customer's mention of wanting money back for a purchased product.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the order involving the jacket.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I'm here to assist you with your refund request for your recent jacket purchase.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the product has been opened or used so we can proceed with the refund process?
The order number is 123456789, and the jacket is completely new with tags still attached. I havenâ€™t worn it or taken it out of the packaging.
Thank you for the information. We can process your refund upon receiving the returned jacket. Please send it back using the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly.
Great, thanks! I appreciate the prepaid label. I'll send the jacket back as soon as I receive it to complete the refund process.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. You should see the amount credited to your original payment method within 5 business days.
Just checking in to make sure your refund has been received and if you need any further assistance from us today.
Since the refund has been confirmed and no further issues were reported, we have now closed this case. Thank you for contacting support.
